Entry.JapaneseText: ダナさんとオックスさん、 幸せになれるといいですね。
Entry.EnglishText: I hope that Dana and Ochs will be able to find their happily ever after.

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ……この先、色々な障害があると 思うけど……がんばってほしいわ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes... I think there are still many trials ahead of them, but... I want them to do their best.

Entry.JapaneseText: 大丈夫、大丈夫！ 愛があれば、雨が降っても、 雷に打たれてもへいっちゃらってもんさ！
Entry.EnglishText: Don't worry! So long as you have love, even if it rains or you get struck by lightning, everything will be okay!

Entry.JapaneseText: 今日ばかりは、あんたのそのおめでたい 意見にも、賛成したい気分ね。
Entry.EnglishText: Just for today, I feel like agreeing with your happy-go-lucky perspective.

Entry.JapaneseText: ん？ 今日ばかりは……？ なんかひっかかるなー？
Entry.EnglishText: Huh? Just for today...? Something about that bothers me...
